sub_title: Interim Professional - Storyteller | Product / Service Portfolio Doctor | Commercial Strategist
summary:
I'm an accelerator and a force of change. Not hindered by status quo, I go in with a fresh and creative mind to improve any situation. As an agile and accomplished General I focus on coaching and self-empowering teams towards ambitious long-term commercial results, not just on managing them. Forging professional and personal bonds in leading roles, I have achieved solid results in Product & Portfolio Development, Program Management and Process Management, mostly in B2B, ICT, Digital Transformation and Wholesale Partnerships.

My extensive experience in working within different companies, fields and cultural frameworks, means I will adapt to your specific situational needs in a heartbeat. My analytical and social prowess allow me to dissect a challenge, create an environment in which the challenge can be met, oversee programs through to outstanding results and get all stakeholders onboard in the process.

But more importantly, I'm a great and professional guy to work with. I'm interested in what you do and how we can work together so you can do it even better. Feel free to contact me to see how we can create value together!

school.name: TIAS School for Business and Society

courses.name: The Complete Skilled Negotiator (The Gap Partnership)

profile_positions.description:
I provide interim management and consulting services, focusing on strategic commercial, product & service portfolio and business development challenges.

For KPN (NL):
Developed e-learnings (in cooperation with partner Conceptsales) for the KPN Academy aimed at aiding Telecom SME Resellers in their transformation into full Managed IT Service Providers.

For BE IT (NL):
Redefined positioning of established secondment (detachering) agency. Created a service and pricing structure fitting with the target group. Developed a commercial storyline highlighting unique values and brand promise towards potential clients as well as towards potential candidates. 

For Avit Group (NL):
Redefined primary commercial positioning of the company as a IT Managed Services Provider for Large Enterprise & Corporate clients. Designed the modular services portfolio sold throughout pan-European network of subsidiaries. Defined the Value Proposition and designed associated Sales & Delivery processes.

For MoveMove (NL):
Redefined commercial positioning for payment card/app for business travel expenses aimed at SME and solopreneurs. Designed subscription-based Mobility Services Portfolio and Pricing structure.

For QUANZA (NL):
Redefined positioning of established IT Network Services Provider to full IT Operator. Developed a commercial storyline highlighting unique values and brand promise towards existing and new clients.

For SCALE IT (NL):
Defined the positioning of an IT Managed Services start-up with hight personal-attention based IT Workspace services for the SME market. Created pricing structure and commercial storyline. 

For TELBO (Bonaire):
Redesigned Wholesale Data Services portfolio into a modular and stackable proposition.

For UTS (Curaçao):
Developed and structured Wholesale Telecom Service Portfolio, provided coaching of the Sales team in lead development and deal negotiation resulting in several successful deals with increased profitability.
profile_positions.title: Interim Professional

profile_positions.description:
Introduction of new do-it-for-me KPN Hosting Product Portfolio and implementation of a new external KPN and branded Outbound Channel.

Directed the wholesale Hosted Applications product portfolio strategy and two-year roadmap to be in line with market demands and technical/operational capabilities of KPN Cloud Services

Introduced a new do-it-for-me Online Business Presence Portfolio (domain, hosting, web-building, website analysis and coaching) through a new external outbound channel by leading a multi-disciplinary team as Product Owner. Successfully negotiated a margin of 45% (normal cloud average of 35%)

Set up and executed the product portfolio strategy and two-year roadmap for an indirect channel’s Hosted Applications portfolio, inline with market demands and the capabilities of KPN Cloud Services

Successfully negotiated several new contracts from self developed qualified (inter) national leads

Set up commercial campaigns and negotiated contributions between wholesale customers and suppliers
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager - Cloud & Hosting

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the outgoing international voice traffic of KPN and its wholesale customers, identified and capitalised on many commercial opportunities, sought strategic combinations of KPN subsidiaries’
portfolio’s, resulted in 300% revenue increase and 100% margin increase over the span of 18 months

Developed and implemented commercial strategy and future-proof new propositions for the KPN
interconnection portfolio based on IP, oversaw roll-out of the IP interconnections as Program Manager

Successful contract negotiations with all new entrants and existing telecom providers, fully capitalizing on balance of power within each interconnection relationship within the confines of telecom regulation

Acted in Special Sales role in commercial deals with a high strategic value, formulating the business case and final bid, as well as negotiating the final commercial proposition and closing the deal
profile_positions.title: Sr. Commercial Product Manager & Portfolio Manager - Interconnection Services

profile_positions.description:
Lead a multidisciplinary, multi-company team in aircraft feasibility study and procurement, resulted in a
comprehensive overview of feature requirements and identification of the optimum candidate  

Lead design team in the successful development and adaptation of strategic transport planning software

Professionalized Project Management at TNO, initiatives resulted in clearer, less bureaucratic procedures

Lead an international knowledge collaboration between defence research institutes (UK, N, NL)
